title: Sorry, acquisition timeout! when using Sqlite
body:
### Describe the bug

```posh
2022-09-08 13:12:35,306 ERROR [com.exa.con.ErrHandle] (executor-thread-1) ??? to handle request: javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.HibernateException: Could not apply work
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

quarkus.datasource.jdbc.max-size=1
quarkus.datasource.jdbc.initial-size=1

When I increase the max-size, there will be a database lock,When max-size is 1, Sorry, acquisition timeout



code:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48701152/189042376-0b7353c9-9e7b-45f8-99b6-e0bd0a579fbd.png)


### How to Reproduce?

_No response_

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

windows 10

### Output of `java -version`

java17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.11.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvnw

### Additional information

_No response_
